Class RandomMazeGenerator

java.lang.Object
  RandomMazeGenerator

public class RandomMazeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This Class will generate a random maze based on given class constants and pseudo-random numbers. There will always be a start and an exit, and there will always be a path between the two.

Author:
klt018

Field Summary
private  int COLS
          Number of columns to the maze.

          2-D array for holding the maze.

          Number of rows to the maze.
private  double WALL_PROB
          Probability of a wall spawning randomly.
 
Constructor Summary
RandomMazeGenerator()
          Generates a new random maze.
 
Method Summary
private  void generate()
          Fills the 2-D array with a randomly created maze.
private  void print()
          Writes the 2-D array to a text file for later use by the Maze class.
